name: Hank's Quest for Soup
description:
After 20 years of eating nothing but porridge, Hank decides to collect ingredients for a nice tasty soup.

A simple side-scroller where the goal of each stage is to pick up the soup ingredient at the end.

Currently features:

• 3 soups to collect ingredients for, each with a unique set of levels, including:
-Leek & Potato soup, set in Onion Forest, teeming with curious wildlife
-Lobster Bisque, set in Crab Coast, where soft sands border a shimmering ocean
-Pumpkin soup, set in Pumpkin Hollow, a dark haunted valley where few dare to venture
• 8 challenges to complete per soup
• Unlockable game modes including time trial mode
• Controller support- tested with XBox One controller but should work for others too

Created entirely by me, Sean T.
